title: Harper's Weekly
additional-note: The original run of Harper's Weekly ended in 1916, and all of its copyrights have expired due to age. We are not aware of any revivals of the title that took place at times when copyright renewals might still be active.  (Copyrights for revivals from the 1970s onward would renew automatically.)
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
